actions.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4820.

official_title: To clear certain impediments to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.

titles.title: To clear certain impediments to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.
